FuncDef: This command configures start of summer time settings.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the starting week of the month when the summer time takes effect. Values-first, second, third, fourth, last. ParamDefault: Default- first
Specifies the starting day of the week when the summer time takes effect. Values-sunday, monday, tuesday, wednesday, thursday, friday, saturday. ParamDefault: Default- sunday

Specifies the starting month of the year when the summer time takes effect. Values-january, february, march, april, may, june, july, august, september, october, november, december. ParamDefault: Default- january
Specifies the time at which the summer time takes effect, in hh:mm format. Values-hours: 00 to 23. ParamDefault: Default- 00:00
